name: atom-message-panel-service

0.0.1-1.name: atom-message-panel-service
0.0.1-1.description: a message service provider for Atom

message-panel-view.description: It all depends on this guy, this is your init function and you will need it

plain-message-view.description: Lets you add a simple message

line-message-view.description: Lets you add messages for a specific line and character, and it will even navigate the user to that position with a single click
